allow: Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT COUNT(*), player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM injuries WHERE injury_end_date IS NULL GROUP BY player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status HAVING cnt > 1 ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 20;")
Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT id, injury_body_part, injury_status, injury_end_date, created_at FROM injuries WHERE player_name = ''Mike Evans'' ORDER BY id DESC;")

Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT id, injury_body_part, injury_status, injury_start_date, created_at, updated_at FROM injuries WHERE player_name = ''Mike Evans'' AND injury_end_date IS NULL ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT id, player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status, injury_start_date, injury_end_date, created_at FROM injuries WHERE player_name LIKE ''%Benson%'' ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT id, player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status, injury_end_date, created_at FROM injuries WHERE injury_end_date LIKE ''2025-10-20T09:27:09%'' ORDER BY player_name LIMIT 20;")
Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT COUNT(*), MIN(injury_end_date), MAX(injury_end_date) FROM injuries WHERE injury_end_date LIKE ''2025-10-20T09:27:%'';")

Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status, COUNT(*) as cnt, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids, GROUP_CONCAT(created_at) as dates FROM injuries WHERE injury_end_date IS NULL GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(sqlite3 injury_history.db "SELECT player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status, COUNT(*) as total_records, SUM(CASE WHEN injury_end_date IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_records, GROUP_CONCAT(SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 16)) as creation_dates FROM injuries GROUP BY player_name, injury_body_part, injury_status HAVING total_records > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 10;")
